action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ ▢ X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ X X
X X ▢ X X
DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 matrix. The center row and center column are filled with empty squares (▢), forming a cross pattern. The rest of the squares are filled with X's.

Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:

X ▢ ▢ X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ X X
X X ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 matrix. The first two rows have the pattern: X, empty, empty, X, X. The third row is all empty cells. The fourth row matches the first two rows. The last row starts with two Xs, followed by an empty cell, and ends with two Xs.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 matrix. The center row and center column are filled with empty squares (▢), forming a cross pattern. The rest of the squares are filled with X's.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are the cells in the first row of your grid filled with X's except for the center cell?
